alert.note: Alert for Escambia; Okaloosa; Santa Rosa (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 18 at 11:51AM EDT until June 18 at 12:30PM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Okaloosa County in northwestern Florida... Santa Rosa County in northwestern Florida... Northwestern Escambia County in northwestern Florida... * Until 1130 AM CDT. * At 1051 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 4 miles west of Flomaton to 8 miles southwest of Molino, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Gonzalez, Pace, Milton, Century, Flomaton, Bagdad, Baker, Molino, Jay, Point Baker, Pea Ridge, Roeville and Floridatown. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
